PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID, RXMENUACTION.NAME, RXMENUACTION.URL, RXMENUACTION.URL AS url1 , RXMODE.MODEID, RXUICONTEXT.UICONTEXTID, RXMENUACTION.NAME AS name1 , RXMENUACTION.DISPLAYNAME, RXMENUACTION.SORTORDER FROM RXMODE, RXMODEUICONTEXTACTION, RXUICONTEXT, RXMENUACTION WHERE RXMODE.MODEID = RXMODEUICONTEXTACTION.MODEID AND RXUICONTEXT.UICONTEXTID = RXMODEUICONTEXTACTION.UICONTEXTID AND RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID = RXMODEUICONTEXTACTION.ACTIONID AND RXMODE.NAME = ':"PSXSingleParam/sys_mode"' AND RXUICONTEXT.NAME = ':"PSXSingleParam/sys_uicontext"' AND RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID not in(select CHILDACTIONID from RXMENUACTIONRELATION) ORDER BY RXMENUACTION.SORTORDER ASC

SELECT DISTINCT RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID, RXMENUACTION.NAME, RXMENUACTION.SORTORDER FROM RXMODE, RXUICONTEXT, RXUICONTEXTACTION, RXMENUACTION, RXMENUACTIONRELATION WHERE RXMODE.MODEID = RXUICONTEXT.MODEID AND RXUICONTEXT.UICONTEXTID = RXUICONTEXTACTION.UICONTEXTID AND RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID = RXUICONTEXTACTION.ACTIONID AND RXMODE.NAME = ':"PSXSingleParam/sys_mode"' AND RXUICONTEXT.NAME = ':"PSXSingleParam/sys_uicontext"' AND RXMENUACTION.ACTIONID != RXMENUACTIONRELATION.ACTIONID ORDER BY RXMENUACTION.SORTORDER ASC
